## blockRendering.Drawer.layoutField\_() method

Push a field or icon's new position to its SVG root.

**Signature:**

```typescript
protected layoutField_(fieldInfo: Icon | Field): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  fieldInfo | [Icon](./blockly.blockrendering.icon.md) \| [Field](./blockly.blockrendering.field.md) | The rendering information for the field or icon. |
